How good is Portal 2?


Well, let me put it this way: if the next Half Life game, whether it's called Half Life 3 or Half Life 2 Episode 3 or whatever, manages to be anywhere near as good as Portal 2, then it will be worth the time it took to finally release.

No, seriously. Just get Portal 2. This review doesn't explain why Portal 2 is worth getting, because you have to see for yourself. 

Get the first one, then get Portal 2.
I played it! I beat it. I am just waiting to do the multiplayer with someone!

Portal 2. Bom, não sei de onde começar, bom, é um jogo que deveria (como portal 1 ) ter uma dlc de medidor de qi.
Portal 2 inovou muito de Portal 1 . Ele ja começou muito bem te apresentando aos mecanismos pra lá de básicos, tem uma história mais, perceptivel , comparado a Portal, ele TEM história. Segundo, ele adicionou um modo que muita gente conhece em outros jogos, o Co-Op, ou para os brazileiros como eu, Modo Cooperativo. Nele você entra na maquinaria(saco a indireta? Entra na pele, entra na maquinaria?) de um dos dois robôs mais carismaticos da historia da valve, perdendo para a nossa querida GLaDOS, Atlas e P-Body, cujo quem é quem é escolhido ( no caso de jogo entre amigos steam) entre que convida quem quem foi convidado. Quem convida entra na maquinaría de Atlas (azul), um robô com aparência baixa e redonda, e o convidado é a P-Body (cor laranja), uma robô(sim isso está certo, umA robô) com estatura alta e magra, naqule padrão da comédia, alto magro e baixo gordo.
Você ainda pode customizar seus robôs da maneira que você quiser, desde um chapéu de Team Fortress 2 (aviso: não são todos, como o Boné da Mann. Co.) até algum item que vc acha jogando mesmo.
Portal 2 é um jogo que recompensa cada segundo e centavo gasto. O pior é que você não ganha bolo.

Шедевральная игра с неповторимой атмосферой, юмором; с отличной графикой и молчаливой сексуальной главной героиней по имени Челл, являющейся, судя по всему, дальней родственницей Гордона Фримена :) Однако, беспрерывная болтовня Уитли и Глэдос с лихвой это молчание компенсируют :)
Первый Портал стал новой вехой в индустрии видеоигр, ну а второй - допиленной, улучшенной во всех отношениях версией - все недостатки, которые присутствовали в первой части, были учтены и изничтожены.

Кроме этого, в игре присутствуют интереснейшие кооператив и редактор уровней.
Вобщем, кто не играл в Портал, тот многое пропустил. Ну а кто не играл в Портал 2 - пропустил многое в квадрате.

Portal 2 is a much more story-centric game that it's predecesor, Portal. The first game had it's focus on the simple environments of Aperture Science, having you solve tests and not much else. This is not that game. Portal 2 features wide, expansive levels and environments, many parts of the game are not so much puzzle solving as admiring the world. While some points may frustrate players, it is annoying when you can't find the single portal-able surface in a large room to move on, this gives you a chance to look around and admire all Aperture has to offer. Even if you haven't played the first game, which I highly  reccommend you do, Portal 2 is a grea game for anyone who loves puzzles, and witty robotic commentary.

For those who haven't played the first part: Portal is a game, which makes you think. You work in a laboratory and have to solve small (or sometimes big) testchambers, but they are all different so it doesn't get boring. Before you buy this game, you should buy the first one-the story goes on.

My opinion: This is the BEST game of the world. You can have endless fun (with or without your friends) ,because there are millions of maps, which are created by other people. The first part was also good, but it´s short. The second part is perfect: A long story, you can create your own maps and play the maps from your friends. This game is so cool, I would buy it again if I had to.

And now: stop reading this and buy the game :)

Bien qu'actuellement mon nombre d'heure de jeux soit minime, j'ai deja terminé ce jeux sur un autre support..

Et je dois dire que Portal 2 est un CHEF D'OEUVRE, et je ne mâcha pas mes mots.

Le jeux nous transporte à travers un scénario plus que correcte dans un casse-tête géant entre le film "CUBE" et un huit-clos futuriste et énigmatique.

La narration est exelente, l'humour omniprésent avec un "sidekick" complétement déjanté..

Un 20/20 pour l'ambiance musicale qui est juste parfaite avec un subtile mélange electro ,musique rétro, teinté de thèmes futuriste et atmosphère noir....Waou!!

Le gameplay dans son ensemble est juste nikel, instinctif, simple et efficace.

Ce jeux est un MUST-HAVE

Portal is an Amazing game made by Valve the makers of the best PC games on the market. However Portal 2 the sequel to Portal and has from its release claimed the time and effort off every gamer in the planet. This game is simply one of the best games on the market. Who hasn't got this game.....? Well to summarise portal 2 picks of from where portal left off. The noticeable differences in the game are the Graphics having a huge improvement and the inclusion of gels which really create new problems and solutions which can make your head hurt. Portal 2 in my eyes is the ultimate puzzle game and I would insist you get this awesome game. 10/10
I've replayed the singleplayer campaign as well as co-op multiple times. The story is very well done, and the co-op challenging but enjoyable.

10/10

P.S. Tippfehler sind Spezialeffekte der Tastatur!
